questions.question: What small clamping tool holds the hook firmly while the fly tier wraps materials around it?
What type of thread was wrapped around the hook to secure feathers and other materials in place?

What small tool helped a fly tier pull thread through a tiny loop to create the whip finish knot?
What tail feather from a ring-necked bird was used in the famous 'Pheasant Tail Nymph'?
What holds the spool of tying thread and allows it to hang weighted below the hook while tying?

What shiny, iridescent feather fiber from a peacock was used on many classic fly patterns for the body?
What famous fly pattern, featuring red thread, white wings, and peacock herl, has been a staple since the 1800s?
